MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L14 and L16 postcode areas of Liverpool, affecting properties in Bowring Park Road, Rockville Road, Glendevon Road and the surrounding area. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 2:07 am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:30 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:53 am on 1st April, 2021.
